event AttachmentAccessed(bytes32 indexed walletId, address indexed accessor, string action, uint256 timestamp)
event AttachmentShared(bytes32 indexed walletId, address indexed owner, address indexed sharedWith, uint256 timestamp)
event AttachmentWalletAuthorized(bytes32 indexed walletId, address indexed owner, bytes32 authorizationTx, uint256 timestamp)
event AttachmentWalletCreated(bytes32 indexed walletId, address indexed owner, bytes32 indexed sourceEmailWallet, string filename, bytes32 contentHash, uint256 timestamp)
event AttachmentWalletVerified(bytes32 indexed walletId, bytes32 contentHash, string ipfsHash, uint256 blockNumber)
event OwnershipTransferred(address indexed previousOwner, address indexed newOwner)
function accessLogs(bytes32, uint256) view returns (address accessor, string action, uint256 timestamp, string ipAddress)

function attachmentWallets(bytes32) view returns (bytes32 walletId, string walletType, address owner, uint256 createdAt, bytes32 authorizationTx, uint8 status, (bytes32 sourceEmailWallet, string originalFilename, string receivedVia, uint256 attachmentIndex, string emailSender, string emailSubject, uint256 emailTimestamp) origin, (string filename, string mimeType, string fileExtension, uint256 fileSize, bytes32 contentHash, string fileSignature, (bool scanned, bool clean, string scanner, uint256 scannedAt, string scanResult) virusScan) fileData, (uint256 createdDate, uint256 lastModified, string author, string title, string subject, string producer, uint256 pageCount, bool encrypted, bool passwordProtected, string[] customPropertyKeys) metadata, (bytes32 contentHash, string ipfsHash, bytes32[] merkleProof, uint256 blockNumber, uint256 verifiedAt, string network, bool independentVerification) verification, (bool publicAccess, bool independentAccess, bool shareableWithoutEmail, address[] sharedWith, uint256 downloadCount) access)
function authorizeAttachmentWallet(bytes32 walletId, bytes32 authorizationTx, bytes signature)

function createAttachmentWallet(bytes32 sourceEmailWallet, string originalFilename, string filename, string mimeType, string fileExtension, uint256 fileSize, bytes32 contentHash, string fileSignature, string ipfsHash, uint256 attachmentIndex, string emailSender, string emailSubject, uint256 emailTimestamp) returns (bytes32 walletId)

function getAttachmentWallet(bytes32 walletId) view returns (bytes32 id, string walletType, address owner, uint256 createdAt, uint8 status, string filename, string mimeType, uint256 fileSize, bytes32 contentHash, string ipfsHash)
function verifyAttachmentWallet(bytes32 walletId, bytes32 providedHash) view returns (bool)
